ThingDef.label: blunderbuss
ThingDef.description: Originally wielded by pirates, the blunderbuss was effective in close-quarters combat due to its wide muzzle and scattering shot capabilities.

ThingDef.label: blunderbuss long gun
ThingDef.description: The long gun version of the blunderbuss, while lacking the range and precision of a flintlock rifle, was designed to fire multiple pellets at short to medium range. The blunderbuss was effective in close-quarters combat due to its wide muzzle and scattering shot capabilities.

ThingDef.label: flintlock rifle
ThingDef.description: One of the earliest firearms ever created, this weapon proved reliable for both hunting and colony defense due to its versatility and ease of use. Its robust design made it a valuable tool for early settlers in protecting their communities and securing food sources.

ThingDef.label: flintlock long gun
ThingDef.description: A long gun variant of one of the earliest firearms ever created, this weapon proved reliable for both hunting and colony defense due to its versatility and ease of use. Its robust design made it a valuable tool for early settlers in protecting their communities and securing food sources.

ThingDef.label: percussion rifle
ThingDef.description: An advanced iteration of flintlock firearms, this model utilizes percussion caps to ignite the black powder within the chamber. Due to the rudimentary rifling in the gun barrel, the projectile achieves a longer range, higher velocity, and enhanced armor penetration.

ThingDef.label: percussion long gun
ThingDef.description: The long gun variant of the percussion rifle featured a longer barrel and rudimentary rifling, granting it extended range and improved accuracy over earlier flintlock rifles.

ThingDef.label: scoped percussion long gun
ThingDef.description: The long gun variant of the percussion rifle featured a longer barrel and rudimentary rifling, granting it extended range and improved accuracy over earlier flintlock rifles. It is now outfitted with a scope, offering the wielder increased ranged weapon accuracy.

ThingDef.label: revolving rifle
ThingDef.description: A single-action percussion revolving rifle, equipped with a revolving cylinder that allows it to fire six projectiles in rapid succession, significantly outpacing the firing rate of earlier rifles.

ThingDef.label: revolving long gun
ThingDef.description: A long gun variant of the revolving rifle, designed for increased accuracy. Equipped with a revolving cylinder, it can fire six projectiles in rapid succession, significantly outpacing the firing rate of earlier rifles.

ThingDef.label: scoped revolving long gun
ThingDef.description: A long gun variant of the revolving rifle, designed for increased accuracy. Equipped with a revolving cylinder, it can fire six projectiles in rapid succession, significantly outpacing the firing rate of earlier rifles. It is now outfitted with a scope, offering the wielder increased ranged weapon accuracy.

ThingDef.label: frontier revolver
ThingDef.description: A simple yet reliable single-action percussion revolver, the frontier revolver is a common sight in the holsters of settlers across the rim. Unlike other revolver-type firearms, it boasts a slightly faster fire rate, reduced warm-up time, and delivers a powerful punch with each shot.

ThingDef.label: hunters flame sprayer
ThingDef.description: A hand-held flamethrower often used to incinerate insect hives and sangophages. Despite its compact size, this mini flamer can unleash a sea of fire at short range, engulfing targets in a blazing inferno within seconds.

ThingDef.label: six barrel magnum
ThingDef.description: An exotic variant of the frontier revolver, the six-barrel magnum features six gun barrels designed to fire simultaneously. It can deliver devastating damage in a single shot but requires time to reload.

ThingDef.label: turret magnum
ThingDef.description: An exotic variant of the frontier revolver, the turret magnum features a custom cylinder capable of firing in ten-shot bursts before requiring reloading.

ThingDef.label: enouy revolver
ThingDef.description: An exotic variant of the frontier revolver, the Enouy revolver features eight revolver cylinders arranged in a revolver-like manner. This design allows for faster reload speed by rotating out the empty cylinder and rotating in a fresh one.

ThingDef.label: volley rifle
ThingDef.description: An exotic, reimagined version of the blunderbuss, the volley rifle features seven rifled cylinders designed to fire simultaneously. This innovation vastly improves accuracy and range over the original blunderbuss, allowing it to reach distant targets with greater effectiveness.

ThingDef.label: marauder cannon
ThingDef.description: A hand held cannon that was once used in naval warships, now repurposed as a hand-held heavy weapon. It possess devastating firepower and incredible range, which allows the user to take-out groups of enemies at long distances.

ThingDef.label: marauder gatling gun
ThingDef.description: A hand-held, machine-powered Gatling gun. It is bulky and heavy to use, relying on a chemfuel-powered mechanism to fire 30 rounds of bullets at groups of enemies. Despite its cumbersome nature, it excels at providing crowd control and suppressive fire against any foes.
